title: Blood orange Halloween pumpkin pie
description: There's nothing ghoulish about this sweet citrus pie topped with meringue.For this recipe you will need a 20cm/8in pie dish, a sugar thermometer, a freestanding mixer, a handheld (stick) blender and a chef's blowtorch.
ingredients: 170g/5¾oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/2½oz chilled unsalted butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
300g/10½oz pumpkin purée (available online and in the baking section of some large supermarkets)
1½ blood oranges, zest of both and juice of one
50ml/2fl oz blood orange juice (available in large supermarkets)
